name: CircularFifoQueueTest
description: Unit tests for the CircularFifoQueue class, focusing on its behavior and edge cases.

test_cases.name: testAddNull
test_cases.description: Tests that adding a null element to the CircularFifoQueue throws a NullPointerException.

test_cases.name: testCircularFifoQueueCircular
test_cases.description: Tests the circular behavior of the CircularFifoQueue by adding elements and checking their presence and order.

test_cases.name: testCircularFifoQueueRemove
test_cases.description: Tests the removal operation of the CircularFifoQueue to ensure it removes the first element correctly.

test_cases.name: testConstructorException1
test_cases.description: Tests that the constructor throws an IllegalArgumentException when given a size of 0.

test_cases.name: testConstructorException2
test_cases.description: Tests that the constructor throws an IllegalArgumentException when given a negative size.

test_cases.name: testConstructorException3
test_cases.description: Tests that the constructor throws a NullPointerException when given a null collection.

test_cases.name: testDefaultSizeAndGetError1
test_cases.description: Tests the default size and get method of the CircularFifoQueue, ensuring it throws an exception for out-of-bounds indices.

test_cases.name: testDefaultSizeAndGetError2
test_cases.description: Tests the default size and get method of the CircularFifoQueue, ensuring it throws an exception for negative indices.

test_cases.name: testGetIndex
test_cases.description: Tests the get method of the CircularFifoQueue to ensure it retrieves elements correctly after removals.

test_cases.name: testRemoveError1
test_cases.description: Tests the removal of elements from the CircularFifoQueue, ensuring the queue maintains the correct order.

test_cases.name: testRemoveError2
test_cases.description: Tests the removal of elements from the CircularFifoQueue, ensuring the queue maintains the correct order after overflow.

test_cases.name: testRemoveError3
test_cases.description: Tests the removal of elements from the CircularFifoQueue, ensuring the queue maintains the correct order after multiple removals and additions.

test_cases.name: testRemoveError4
test_cases.description: Tests the removal of elements from the CircularFifoQueue, ensuring the queue maintains the correct order after removing an element in the middle.

test_cases.name: testRemoveError5
test_cases.description: Tests the removal of elements from the CircularFifoQueue, ensuring the queue maintains the correct order after removing the last element.

test_cases.name: testRemoveError6
test_cases.description: Tests the removal of elements from the CircularFifoQueue, ensuring the queue maintains the correct order after removing the first element.

test_cases.name: testRemoveError7
test_cases.description: Tests the removal of elements from the CircularFifoQueue, ensuring the queue maintains the correct order after removing the second element.

test_cases.name: testRemoveError8
test_cases.description: Tests the removal of elements from the CircularFifoQueue, ensuring the queue maintains the correct order after removing an element and shifting the last element.

test_cases.name: testRemoveError9
test_cases.description: Tests the removal of elements from the CircularFifoQueue, ensuring the queue maintains the correct order after removing the last element in the queue.

test_cases.name: testRepeatedSerialization
test_cases.description: Tests the serialization and deserialization of the CircularFifoQueue, ensuring the queue maintains its state.
